attributes.action: impeach himself and the Home Secretary for outrageously using the Police in a far left political manner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The outrageous and Stalinist arrest of Damian Green for doing his job in exposing the current government must be punished. The current government has politicised the Police to such an extent that the country is becoming a near communist dictatorship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
